body:
Hi I have a issue about the stomper kit
I recently got banned for team killing with stomper and I KEEP DOING IT BY ACCIDENT
I love stomper so I'm always it and in the description it says damage transfers to nearby ENEMY!!! players so when I 1st used it I went to get blaze rock with /surface on tetris jungle and I jumped down and SQUASH I stomped my team mate I let RefuseToSink know and she said we should fix that.
I REALLY DONT WANNA GET BANNED AGAIN WITH THE AWESOME STOMPER KIT Please leave Ideas in the comments and I can either
1) stop doing it 
2) we delete stomper
3) we fix stomper kit so we cant kill our team mates

title: The walls stomper kit

replies.body:
Firstly, if you were temp banned, appeal at support@avicus.net
Secondly, if you have an issue, please report it at github - https://github.com/Avicus
replies.body_tagged:
Firstly, if you were temp banned, appeal at support@avicus.net
Secondly, if you have an issue, please report it at github - https://github.com/Avicus

replies.body:
First: Stop doing it and report it at github. done! No need for a thread, if you would read the ingame messages. They are saying report bugs at github.
Second: Wrong subforum, it should be in server-feedback (and not, because in the stickied thread is explained what to do. [Here])
Edit: got ninja'd

replies.body: You can't post it on the named subforum. If you read this post (the already named stickied post: http://avicus.net/forums/bdc6829ed) You'll see that the only option is to report the bug on the avicus github.
